text: Viktor Aleksandrovich Zinger (29 October 1941 â€” 24 September 2013) was an ice hockey goaltender who played in the Soviet Hockey League. Zinger was a five- time world champion and also won the gold medal with the Soviet ice hockey team at the 1968 Winter Olympics. Zinger was inducted into the Russian and Soviet Hockey Hall of Fame in 1967. He died on September 24, 2013 in Moscow, Russia. ==References== == Other websites == *Russian and Soviet Hockey Hall of Fame bio Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:1941 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Russian ice hockey goaltenders
title: Viktor Zinger
